content: Hey everyone - we have two projects that we are working on - Patient Contributed Data and Patient Corrections. Both have weekly conference calls on Monday. Check out our Calendar on confluence for details. Please join us and help us create a medium for the patient voice to be heard! https://confluence.hl7.org/display/PE/calendars Thank you in advance.

@Bray Patrick-Lake @Morgan Gleason In both your presentations at Devdays, you talked about the need for patients to be able to contribute their voice into the healthcare system. We have two projects that we think your insight would be really helpful on - Patient Contributed Data and Patient Corrections - and would be honored if you would consider joining our efforts in some capacity. These project groups meet on Mondays Eastern - 12 for patient contributed data and 3 for patient corrections.
Just put the meetings in my calendar. I'll probably begin dialing in next week.
